    public class LsaStandardAction
extends LsaAbstractAction
    This action add LsaMolecule in a single node.

    • Method Detail

      • cloneOnNewNode

        public LsaStandardAction cloneOnNewNode(INode<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> n,
                                        IReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> r)
        Description copied from interface: IAction
        This method allows to clone this action on a new node. It may result useful to support runtime creation of nodes with the same reaction programming, e.g. for morphogenesis.
        Specified by:
        cloneOnNewNode in interface IAction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
        Specified by:
        cloneOnNewNode in interface ILsaAction
        Specified by:
        cloneOnNewNode in class LsaAbstractAction
        Parameters:
        n - The node where to clone this IAction
        r - The reaction to which the CURRENT action is assigned
        Returns:
        the cloned action
